Notes:

nope its not ted yet, but its a release to keep you warm till then

Well had to use the Readnfo tag on this, technically its a perfect hdcam and a perfect line, just some missing video is the reason
is it much? that depends how you see it, 3 spots miss 4 min each
At 16:38 missing video is them driving to the forest nothing much missed
At 18:13 missing video is them walking through the forest to meet the king a little missing after their chat and walking to the bar for a drink

had line had video why not combine them for you to watch
Problem is, there is only 1 cam out and there wont be coming another one till retail aug 28th
Neither Russia or USA have cammed that movie, portuguese have done this cam 2 weeks ago,and didnt proper it till now
movie hits europe after usa retail date, so if you want to watch this movie you have to live with this one or wait till retail on aug 28th
its still a good watch

Encode:

spent cpl hours on that video, cause it needed rotating and fixing perspective
cam consists of 3 positions, centered, a bit too high and a bit too low, so had to cut the movie in pieces and fix them each individually
couldnt do same resolution for all 3 parts without getting eggheads or shrinked ones, but i didnt want to crop any video away
so i used the one which had the max height and added virtual borders for the parts that had too less and centered them
doing that you dont loose any video on any side, no eggheads and not shrinked ones, or yellow people lol
technically you wont see the ar change, cause i hid them in transitions

Audio from S4NDM4N was superb, cant be done better, there was no reason to clean it, synced lipsync to my video

had this for myself for a while i got some free time window to share today
ts quilty lol
get a new translator nobody knows what ya saying in ya nfo
instead of reproducing same thing that already been done i work on this new source so you guys have new thing and got it pretty sexy
oh i wasnt going to do this but was asked to lol by who ffs but nonetheless i used the mystery vobs passed from a friend lol

still got very nice
enjoy
